name: Northstar Courier: HPS1 Demo
description:
WARNING: YOUR GAME WILL CRASH IF YOU HAVE A SWITCH CONTROLLER PLUGGED IN

_________________________________________________________________________

Explore the depths of a little bayside town as you deliver packages and uncover its dark underbelly. In Northstar Courier, you take the role of a 20-year-old delivery worker as she becomes accustomed to her new life in a small town. With the help of a rusty scooter, you make your way around town as you talk to the local residents, enjoy photography and fulfil your company's mysterious requests regarding odd sightings. With over 10+ cryptids to track down, will you find them all before the clock strikes midnight. Who knows what lurks in your dreams...

_________________________________________________________________________

Featuring:
  • Little open world to explore
  • Moped gameplay
  • Photography stuff
  • 10+ Classic and new Cryptids
  • Scary

_________________________________________________________________________

Controls:
  • Player Controls
    • Walk - WASD
    • Run: L Shift
    • Interact:  E
    • Mount(Moped): Q
  • Camera Controls
    • Camera View: R Mouse
    • Take Photo: L Mouse
    • Zoom: Q-E
  • Gun
    • Shoot: L Mouse
